casebody.data:
No. 144. Heiner v. A. W. Mellon. October 18, 1937. Paul Mellon, David K. E. Bruce, and Donald D. Shepard, Executors of the Estate of A, W. Mellon, substituted as parties respondent i'n place of A. W. Mellon, deceased, on motion of Mr. William Wallace Booth for the respondents.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
